!SLIDE transition=scrollUp center

# `ENV`

!SLIDE

    @@@ruby
    > ENV
     => {...}
    > ENV.keys
     => [...]
    > ENV.each
     => {...}

!SLIDE

    @@@ruby
    > ENV.each
     => {...}
    > {}.each
     => #<Enumerator: {}:each>

!SLIDE center

    @@@ruby
    > ENV.class
     => Object

[![It's a trap!](its_a_trap.gif "It's a trap!")](https://secure.flickr.com/photos/theshadowknows/3208624099/)
